author: hwright
msg: Merge r31820, 31859 from trunk:
Performance improvements for BDB-backed repository post-commit
deltification.
Votes:
+1: brane, cmpilato, kfogel

author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r31868 with more iterpool improvements.
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c
(do_wc_to_wc_moves): Move the destruction of the iterpool to right
after the loop, and thus before some possible return points.
(do_wc_to_wc_copies): Same.  Also, use iterpool for splitting the path.

author: glasser
msg: Nominate r31868 for backport to the 1.5.x branch.

author: glasser
msg: Fixes to pool usage in libsvn_client copy code.  Specifically, prevent
unbounded memory use when wc-to-wc copying or moving multiple files,
by passing an iterpool to propagate_mergeinfo_within_wc.
Found by: Matt McHenry <mmchenry@carnegielearning.com>
* subversion/libsvn_client/copy.c
(do_wc_to_wc_copies, do_wc_to_wc_moves): Call
propagate_mergeinfo_within_wc with the iterpool.
(setup_copy): Use the iterpool for an URI decode.
(svn_client_copy4): Use the subpool for an URI decode.  Be explicit
that you're setting a variable to NULL.

author: julianfoad
msg: Improve an error message.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_neon/session.c
(parse_url): Give more details, including the URL itself, in the error
message when URL parsing fails.
